job_description: Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript to enhance user experience and functionality. Managed cloud infrastructure by deploying and scaling services on cloud services EC2 instances, ensuring high availability and performance. Built backend APIs with Flask to support e-commerce features and integrated them with frontend components. Optimized server configurations and monitored resource utilization to improve system reliability. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features and troubleshoot technical issues related to cloud deployment and client-side scripting.
